PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: PFDTBT has the deepest HOMO energy level , thus it showed the highest open circuit voltage ( 0.77 V ).

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| deepest HOMO energy level |
| highest open circuit voltage |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| deepest HOMO energy level |
| highest open circuit voltage |
| 0.77 V (open circuit voltage value) |

Note: HOMO stands for Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital. It is a material property that refers to the energy level of the highest occupied electron in a molecule or solid. Open circuit voltage is also a material property that refers to the voltage at which no current flows in an electrical circuit. In this context, the value "0.77 V" is the open circuit voltage value.
